name: chicken gun (happy dev)
description:
Move with arrow keys🤓

Presso enter to start game

Shoot with the left button of the mouse😎

This game has been made for the gam jame  in around 4-5 days this a roguelike with unexpected effect happening every time you eat some butter chicken and your goal is to kill as many chicken as you can in 60 seconds
